channel.title: Projects on chapliboy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on chapliboy

item.title: cluegrid
item.description: cluegrid is a web app to solve crosswords with a friend Link to app Link to source cluegrid was build in elm. It uses websockets for the real time collaborative aspects.

item.title: nimbus
item.description: Nimbus2018 is a minesweeper bot. Lightning talk at PyCon India 2018 Screen recording of the bot in action At the top of the leaderboard. Link to source Nimbus 2018 is a bot that solves minesweeper. It was written in python. It uses PyAutoGui for screen capture, and mouse movements.
